headline: Devon Energy (DVN) Rises As Market Takes a Dip: Key Facts

headline: Devon Energy Unusual Call Option Activity - Investors Expecting a Dividend Hike?
summary: Devon Energy has had unusual call option activity today, according to a Barchart report. Devon announced it will release Q4 earnings on Feb. 17, so investors may be expecting a dividend hike then.

headline: Top Energy Stocks Poised for Gains: WarrenAI Highlights Value Opportunities

headline: FCG: A Look At The Structure And Suitability Of This Energy Equity Index ETF
summary: FCG is best suited for investors with limited energy exposure who hold a bullish thesis on natural gas fundamentals relative to crude oil.
